title: I am overseas in Italy, when I save a new contact it saves the number with the country code +39
content: I called the number to see if I could reach the person, but it marked the number with the +39, I deleted the contact and recreated another one from scratch, but now when I call it does say US, but not when I text. When I text it still says +39 then the number
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
